Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (rSOCs) present a unique possibility in comparison to other available technologies to generate electricity, heat and valuable fuels in one system, in a highly-efficient manner.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: The major issue hindering their commercialization are system reliability and durability.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: A detailed understanding of the processes and mechanisms that occur within rSOCs of industrial-size, is of critical importance for addressing this challenge.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: This study provides in-depth insight into behavior of large planar rSOCs based on a comprehensive experimental and numerical study.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: All the numerical data obtained are validated with the in-house made cells and experiments.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: The sensitivity analysis, which covers a wide range of operating conditions relevant for industrial-sized systems, such as varying operating temperature, H-2/H2O-ratio, operating current etc., provides very good accordance of the cell performance measured and simulated.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: It reveals that lowering fuel volume and thus causing fuel starvation has more pronounced effect in an electrolysis mode, which is visible in both the low-frequency and the middle-frequency range.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: Moreover, both co- and counter-flow are appropriate for the reversible operation.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: However, more uniform current density distribution is achievable for the counter-flow, which is of crucial importance for the real system design.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: The most accurate performance prediction can be achieved when dividing the cell into 15 segments.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: Slightly lower accuracy is reached by logarithmic averaging the fuel compositions, thus reducing the calculation time required.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study

Sentencas: A computationally- and time-efficient model with very precise performance prediction for industrial-sized cells is thus developed and validated.
Titulo: Performance assessment of industrial-sized solid oxide cells operated in a reversible mode: Detailed numerical and experimental study
